title: Distribution of investment fund assets in the U.S. 2018 , by type
summary: This chart shows the Share of mutual fund at the U.S. from Type Domestic_equity_funds to Hybrid_and_other_funds .
\\n From the chart we see that the Share of mutual fund were 41 , at their highest in Domestic_equity_funds .
\\n The mutual fund slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Type to 7 in Hybrid_and_other_funds .
gold: The statistic presents the distribution of mutual fund and ETF assets in the United States in 2018 , by fund type . Domestic equity funds constituted 41 percent of the mutual fund and ETF assets in the United States in 2018 .
